p: The following chemical standards and reagents were used in the course of our study: (-)-cotinine, (R,S)-anatabine, and myosmine purchased from Santa Cruz Biotechnology, Inc., ( ±)-anabasine and scopoletin from Acros Organics, ( ±)-nicotine from Cayman Chemicals, and nornicotine from Sigma Aldrich (purity for all standards was above 90%). Acetonitrile LC–MS grade and extra pure LC–MS water was obtained from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany), magnesium sulphate (MgSO 4) was purchased from Scharlab S.L. (Barcelona, Spain), sodium acetate from Panreac (Barcelona, Spain), primary secondary amine (PSA) from Interchim (Montluçon France), and octyldecylsilane (C18) endcapped from Macherey Nagel (Düren, Germany). Dichloromethane and hexane (pro analysis) were obtained from Fisher Scientific (Pittsburgh, USA).
